entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:38 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
